errors.error_description: The installation steps are in the wrong logical order. It instructs to install pre-commit hooks before installing the project dependencies with 'pipenv install', which will fail because the pre-commit package is not yet installed.
correction_candidates: Reverse the order of the two commands in the 'Installasjon' section.
Combine the two commands into 'pipenv install && pipenv run pre-commit install'.
Remove the 'pipenv run pre-commit install' step from the 'Installasjon' section.
Add 'pipenv shell' before the two commands.
errors.golden_answer: Reverse the order of the two commands in the 'Installasjon' section.

errors.error_description: The 'pipenv' dependency is missing from the system dependencies list, but it is required to manage Python packages and run commands.
correction_candidates: Add 'pip' to the system dependencies list.
Add 'pipenv' to the system dependencies list.
Add 'virtualenv' to the system dependencies list.
Remove the mention of 'pipenv' from the pre-commit command in the Kodestil section.
errors.golden_answer: Add 'pipenv' to the system dependencies list.
